items.sentence: Tom speaks five languages, but doesn\'t know how to be polite in any of them.
Tom didn\'t do a very good job cleaning the kitchen floor. It\'s still dirty.
Why is it so hard for people to understand that I just want to be left alone?
The trouble with you, Tom, is that you never listen to what other people say.
I want each of you to take out a piece of paper and write down what happened.
Tom accused Mary of not knowing how to love or how to accept someone\'s love.
Tom and his brother have agreed to bury the hatchet after years of bickering.
I ought to wear this tie more often. I\'ve gotten a lot of compliments today.
I hope that you don\'t mind my mentioning this, but you know that I love you.
The reason that you have a headache is because you\'ve been working too hard.
Tom asked Mary to see about getting front row seats at the Lady Gaga concert.
Tom bought a bucket of extra-spicy fried chicken and a container of coleslaw.
I saw three sets of footprints in the snow from the road up to my front door.
I think I mistakenly said it was Tom when it was actually Mary that did that.
Why don\'t you just say you don\'t want to do what they\'re asking you to do?
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t likely to be able to do what she was trying to do.
Tom had to stay home all last week because he had to take care of his mother.
Tom didn\'t take the warnings against smoking seriously, until much too late.
Mary spends about thirty minutes a day putting on makeup and fixing her hair.
When I was in college, I always studied most of the night just before a test.
